text: Ezɨ Kenanan otarim, Sedekaia, a uaghan 400pla akam inigha izir gumazir kabar mav. An ainɨn mam inigha, ua bagha bulmakaun komɨn mɨn garir bizir mamɨn ingari. Egha uan dapanim garugha iza Ahap mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, Nɨ Siriabav sogh me abɨragham. Mati nɨ komɨn kamɨn me gasɨvɨra ikɨtɨ me bar gɨvagham.”
